pages.text: $(li)Some $(l:patchouli:illagers/witch)Witches$(/l) are not satisfied with living in small huts, so they live in majestic towers where they live isolated from the outside world.$(br)$(li)You can find a $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/end_remastered/with_pupil)Witch Pupil$(/l) inside of this place.
